name: Dragalge
author: SATOSHI NAKAI
flavor_text: Tales are told of ships that wander into seas where Dragalge live, never to return.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent’s attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Twister
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, discard an Energy from your opponent’s Active Pokémon. If both of them are tails, this attack does nothing.
